conbody.p: Field Remover processoroverviewprocessorsField RemoverThe Field Remover removes fields from records. Use the Field Remover to discard field data that you do not need in the pipeline.

You configure the Field Remover to complete one of the following actions:
Keep listed fields - You list the fields that you want to keep, and the Field Remover removes the remaining fields.
Remove listed fields - You list the fields that you want to remove, and the Field Remover removes all of the listed fields.
Remove listed fields if their values are null - You list the fields that you want to remove, and the Field Remover removes the listed fields when they contain null values.
